artist: Artist: Saul P. Steinberg; Publisher: The Committee to Endow a Chair in Honor of Meyer Schapiro, at Columbia University, New York
creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
description: two horizontal images with cursive-like, illegible "text" above and below each image; top image is black and white with figure wearing a hat and an animal in a horse-drawn cart, in silhouette; other animals (pigs and sheep?) in silhouette in landscape; faux "seal" at top center in sky; bottom image in color; low horizon line with silhouette of standing figure in barren landscape; green and pink at bottom of sky; brownish cloud; faux "seal" in blue at bottom center
provenance: Ruth A. Reister, Minneapolis; Estate of Ruth A. Reister; bequethed to MIA, 2016.
title: Untitled
